english.segment1: On this journey home. I will walk Your road. I will not turn 'round. For another
english.segment2: Make my pathway straight. Into heaven's gates. I will not turn 'round. For another
english.segment3: Lord, it's Your renown. Your eternal fame. That I live for now. It's Your name. It's Your name. For Your name
english.segment4: In my heart I'm sure. I'm completely Yours. I will not bow down. For another
english.segment5: Trade my selfishness. For Your holiness. I will not bow down. For another
english.segment6: When my sun goes down. And the dark surrounds. I will not cry out. For another
